section.p: ‘Unclean!’ warns the man, his voice just a ragged croak issuing from a mouth ravaged by sores. You are horrified by the realization that you have strayed into a hamlet of lepers! Roll a die:

outcomes.outcome:
You
contract the disease
; lose 1 point from each of your abilities (CHARISMA, etc) down to a minimum score of 1

section.p: Remember that if you have a blessing of the goddess Maka, you can use it to negate the effect of the disease.
